title: Henry IV
description: Theatre for a New Audience presents HENRY IV by William Shakespeare, adapted by Dakin Matthews and directed by Eric Tucker. Get a New Deal ticket for just $20 if you are 30 years old or under or a full-time student. Join us for New Deal Night on February 16 with a post-show talkback and party.
address: Polonsky Shakespeare Center, 262 Ashland Place, Brooklyn, NY 11217
